I'm a Social Data Scientist with a background in Political Science, applied quantitative methods, causal inference, and programming in <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i>.


A former PhD student at the <a href="https://politicalscience.ku.dk" target="_blank">Department of Political Science (UCPH)</a>, I currently work as a consultant/analyst/data scientist for a private Danish consultancy firm.

Recently, I've been focusing on spatial data analysis üó∫Ô∏è, data visualization &#128202;, and sports analytics &#9917;.


* Have a look at some of my <a href="https://github.com/jvieroe/dataviz" target="_blank">various data visualizations</a> &#128202; 
* ... and my <a href="https://github.com/jvieroe/TidyTuesday" target="_blank"> #TidyTuesday commits</a> &#128200; 
* I have also published (or am working on) a few <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i> <a href=rpackages.html target="_blank">packages</a> &#128230;
* You can check out my resum√© <a href="https://github.com/jvieroe/CV/blob/main/CV_JeppeVieroe.pdf" target="_blank"> here</a> (download [here](https://github.com/jvieroe/CV/raw/main/CV_JeppeVieroe.pdf))
